thread.section_title: Westbury Hotel Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Budget hotel very good quality
thread.title_full: Budget hotel very good quality - Review of Westbury Hotel Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: OpieBrussels
title: Budget hotel very good quality
text:
Rooms clean comfortable with good showers and bathroom facilities, Great location 5 mins walk from Earsl Court Tube
Reasonable continental breakfast included in price, bread/toat cereal juice t tea coffee etc.
Helpfuo Reception staff
Very good value for London, would recommend
Room Tip: Needed a triple room which is rare, Was able to book ne at good value price See more room tips
